wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Barker  (26 June 1934 – 9 January 2021) was a British academic administrator.

response: *Kenneth Barker, 86, British academic administrator, vice-chancellor of De Montfort University (1992–1999) and Thames Valley University (1999–2003).Professor Kenneth Barker CBE – a tribute to the first Vice-Chancellor of De Montfort University
